headline: Dollar General (DG) Faces Tariff Trouble – Jim Cramer Warns ‘They’ll Definitely Be Hurt!’
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Highlighted 12 Stocks and Tariff Panic. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Dollar General Corporation (NYSE:DG) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer highlighted. On Monday, Jim Cramer, the host of Mad Money, discussed the current market and he identified opportunities […]

headline: Dollar General Expands Beauty Access with New Products & Major Sales Event
summary: GOODLETTSVILLE, Tenn., April 03, 2025--Dollar General is further enhancing its commitment to beauty accessibility with a 7 Days of Savings Beauty event, alongside launching new exclusives.

headline: Trump's 'Liberation Day' tariffs make apparel stocks like Nike uninvestable: Wall Street reacts
summary: Apparel companies brace for a year of profit-busting tariffs.
